item.title: FAISS: Exploring Approximate Nearest Neighbours Cell Probe Methods
item.description: I’ve been learning about vector search in recent weeks and I came across FaceBook’s FAISS library. I wanted to learn the simplest way to do approximate nearest neighbours, and that’s what we’ll be exploring in this blog post. I’ve created a video showing how to do this on my YouTube channel, Learn Data with Mark, so if you prefer to consume content through that medium, I’ve embedded it below:
